title.narrative: ENABLING ENVIRONMENT FOR EDUCATION

description.narrative: Education system managers have capacities and tools for better decentralized management of equitable and quality education services, including in humanitarian situations., which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Evaluation, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Innovation, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: School-aged girls and boys, especially the most vulnerable, those affected by crises or those living in rural areas, acquire fundamental knowledge and instrumental skills necessary for life in a safe, protective and inclusive school environment.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Education system managers have capacities and tools for better decentralized management of equitable and quality education services, including in humanitarian situations.

description.narrative: Malgré la persistance de la COVID-19 et les restrictions de déplacement dues au contexte sécuritaire, l’UNICEF a appuyé le niveau central et le niveau des régions pour le bon fonctionnement et la gestion du système éducatif, tout en s’adaptant à la réorganisation du Ministère de l’Education Nationale en charge désormais des enseignements primaire et secondaire. L’UNICEF a aussi engagé des négociations et conclu des partenariats stratégiques notamment avec le secteur privé pour accélérer l’intégration des innovations dans le système éducatif, lutter contre la crise des apprentissages et enfin améliorer la production, la diffusion et l’utilisation des données. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/01/2022
